Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-8612 affecting package qemu for versions less than 9.1.0-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-8612 affecting package qemu for versions less than 9.1.0-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package qemu is earlier than 9.1.0-1, affected by CVE-2024-8612
